name: readwise-mirror
description: This is a plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.deploy:local: npm run build && cross-env PACKAGE_NAME=$npm_package_name node deploy-local.mjs
scripts.release:local: npm ci && npm run build && npx -p semantic-release-obsidian-plugin@1.1.0 semantic-release --dry-run false
scripts.release:dry-run: npm ci && npm run build && npx -p semantic-release-obsidian-plugin@1.1.0 semantic-release --dry-run
